name: NSColor.ColorType
desc: Constants that indicate the color's type, and which methods may be called on the color object.

items.name: case componentBased
items.desc: Colors that include floating-point color components and a color space.

items.name: case pattern
items.desc: Colors that include an image to be used as a pattern.

items.name: case catalog
items.desc: Colors that are retrieved from an asset catalog.
